briefTitle: The Effect of Octreotide on Wound Drainage After Mastectomy
officialTitle: The Effect of Octreotide on the Duration of Post-mastectomy Wound Drainage: a Randomized Controlled Trial
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* All female breast cancer patients requiring modified radical mastectomy

Exclusion Criteria:

* All mastectomies without axillary clearance (simple and toilet mastectomies)
* Breast-conserving surgeries
* Patients undergoing immediate breast reconstruction after mastectomy
* Previous axillary surgery
